message: Let's be fair and split close to 50/50, Bob.  Every round costs us money!
Your turn Alice.  Let's wrap this up quickly. I'll take a bit more since the value decreases for me each round.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here.  We both lose if this drags out.  Meet me in the middle?
This is getting silly Alice. It's better for both of us to settle now, and I'm offering a very fair split considering the time pressure.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My last offer, let's split the difference and end this.
Okay Alice, last offer. Take it or leave it - we both lose if this keeps going.
